description:
Julie Creswell is a reporter based in The Times's New York office where she has written features about businesses and profiles of key leaders on Wall Street and in health care and retail.
At The New York Times, Julie has covered banks, private equity, hedge funds and health care. Before the Times, she worked for several years at Fortune Magazine and, before that, wrote about debt, monetary policy and mutual funds for several years at Dow Jones.
After attending high school in her small hometown in Western Iowa, she graduated from the University of Iowa with a degree in journalism.
title: Julie Creswell
text:
Julie Creswell is a reporter based in The Times's New York office where she has written features about businesses and profiles of key leaders on Wall Street and in health care and retail.
At The New York Times, Julie has covered banks, private equity, hedge funds and health care. Before the Times, she worked for several years at Fortune Magazine and, before that, wrote about debt, monetary policy and mutual funds for several years at Dow Jones.
After attending high school in her small hometown in Western Iowa, she graduated from the University of Iowa with a degree in journalism.
